title: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A 8.0 Wifi 2GB RAM 32 GB ROM 7.996 inch with Wi-Fi Only Tablet (Black)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Travel Adapter, USB Cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Tablet and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

product_description.Functional Design: This tablet features a lightweight and compact design which makes it easy for you to carry it and use it with just one hand. The lightweight design makes it easy for kids to also use this tablet conveniently.
product_description.Stunning Display: This tablet features a 20.32-cm (8) screen that has a 1280 x 800 pixels resolution. Also, this tablet’s aspect ratio of 16:10 ensures an immersive viewing experience, whether you’re watching a YouTube video or playing games. The dual speakers deliver stunning audio effects, which complements your videos and movies.
product_description.Large Battery Backup: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0 comes with a massive 5100 mAh battery which lets you play games, stream videos, and browse the Web for hours, without having to keep charging this device.
product_description.Power-packed Performance: With 32 GB of internal storage memory, you can store a large number of apps and games on this device. Also, this device’s 2 GB of RAM allows you to quickly switch between watching a movie to shopping on your favorite app without any lag. It also features the Android P OS for a smooth navigation experience.
product_description.Samsung Kids Home and Parental Control F: The Samsung Kids Home feature lets your kids play and learn in a safer environment. The Quick Panel provides access to child-friendly apps so you can let your kids access safe content on this tablet. Thanks to the Parental Control feature, you can not only monitor the usage but also keep a track of the time your kids spend while using this device.
product_description.Share and Create Memories: Even if you stay miles away from your friends and family, you can still keep them updated and stay connected at all times. Through your Samsung account, you can share your photos, calendar entries, and Samsung Notes with them, ensuring distance doesn’t come in between you and your loved ones.
product_description.One UI: This Samsung tablet comes with One UI, which customizes and displays relevant content for you. When you tap on a particular content, it gets focussed, so you get to read the details and information without getting distracted by the other data on the screen.

review:
I’m in love with this device. I feel this is the best tablet in this price range. It is fast and does not lag at all. Some great things about this tablet that I would like to highlight are:
It has a massive battery (5100mAh) life. With this, I get more than 12 hours of screen time so I need to charge it only once every 2 days. Isn’t it just cool?
It has a beautiful 8 inch screen with a good ratio which is perfect for reading books, surfing the web and gaming too. It comes along with dual speakers which makes watching movies and online series super fun😊😊
It has an 8 mp rear camera which is awesome and powerful 👌I use it for taking notes and food pictures which turn out to be awesome.
It is powered by a 2GHz quad core processor with 2gb RAM which is very efficient and does all my work smoothly. Moreover, it is lightweight and easy to hold so carrying it and using it while travelling is super easy. Apart from college, my younger brother uses it at home. Thanks to the Kids Mode through which I am tension-free about what my brother can explore. Overall I would say, this is the best tablet I would get!!

I am writing this review after 10 days use.Ok 1st of all this runs snapdragon 429 a 12nm chip with a superb power saving performance. The processor can easily handle every day's usual work like reading pdf, watching movie, web surfing etc.Battery backup is good and it can easily give you 2 day's battery backup with 8 to 10 hour's screen in time depending on which task you are going to run on this device. It's not for gaming pubg and you should not expect from this. But you can run game like temple run, even free fire.It has a nice look a moderate build quality in this price range. So if you long for a budget tablet in this price, surely it is the best choice. Best size for reading e books. So best for student especially for bookworm. 😇😂

I have also got android 10 update. That has done a significance improvement.

Incredible choice in this price range. The Tablet is lightweight and it is easy to carry "Designed to go wherever you go" the tagline given by the brand is satisfied by the product. It easily fits into one hand. The weight is perfect for children to use it with ease. The display quality of the device is amazing. It has 1280x800 pixel display and a ratio of 16:10. This screen size and ratio is really astonishing for movies and gaming and also for online video platforms like YouTube, etc. Whenever it comes to movies, the most important part is the speakers. And this tablet comes with dual speakers which are fabulously placed for an enriched sound quality. It also comes bundled with a free YouTube Premium subscription so our favorite videos keep playing ad-free and uninterrupted. This is the most valuable point here. The phone comes with a battery of 5100mAh which I think is the most important feature a tablet must have as it has big screen, the juice needed here is quite more than smartphones so a tablet must have this huge battery. The battery is packed so perfectly that the design of the tab is sleek and lightweight. Performance and storage space of Galaxy Tab A 8.0 is just miraculous. The 2GHz Quad-Core is just fast as a lightning. App Switching is quite fast and lag free. Gaming Experience as diehard gamer matters me a lot, and the gaming experience on this device was just wondrous. It comes with 2GB of RAM and 32GB of storage, and the latest Android P OS. A dedicated SD Card slot allows additional storage of up to 512GB.This is the feature to be noticed, I particularly need an external storage to store all my Pictures and Videos. Now comes the best in class feature of this device that is KIDS Mode, this is really a great innovation. I am carefree while handing over my tablet to my niece by just clicking the ‘kids mode’ option. Samsung Kids Home lets me shape a safe environment for my niece to explore. Simply I just need to tap the Quick panel to enjoy the native apps. Parental Control lets me monitor usage and play time so I can hand over the tablet with peace of mind. I love the camera - It is packed with 8 MP primary camera and 2 MP front camera which is also a great combination for a tablet in this range. Camera is great for video calling with my loved ones.

I bought this Samsung A 8.0 tab here on Flipkart and it was a completely safe, satisfied and even fast delivered. great on my create experience with that amazing tab I could tell, that I highly recommend everyone to buy this amazing tab because it has got stunning features, appearance and look.

Here, I am going to tell you some unique and useful specifications of this amazing tab,

1. The Samsung Galaxy A8 tab is lightweight (345g) and it is very easy to carry. The main problem of all other tabs is that, they are very heavyweight, but on this tab it is exactly opposite. Believe me, you won't even feel the tab's weight and it's to easy to carry anywhere. From my experience, I can say that you will be the center of attraction in your appearance when you hold and carry that stunning looking tab and your personality will be developed too by working on this good looking tab.

2. The tab's screen is large (20.31cm/8.0"), comfortable and looks beautiful. it's very helpful for readers, online writers, online workers, gamers, bloggers, to watch movies and many more.

3. It has a long life battery capacity of 5100mAh so that you don't have to worry about changing the phone most of the time or carrying a power bank along with you.

4. Other stunning feature of this amazing tab is that, it has a light-speed CPU processor (Quad-core) of 2Ghz and 2GB RAM, till now, not even once the system hanged of slowed down. You also need not to worry about the space because it has got 32GB ROM and expandable up to 512GB! Also, it has an astonishing Camera of 8mp and 2mp rear and front camera so that you can take as many beautiful pictures as you want with these remarkable camera.

5. Some other unique specifications of this extraordinary tab is that, it consist of Dual speakers which is of great help while listening to music or watching videos.
It also has a unique feature called “Kid's Mode” which will help you to save all your important documents, file, folders, pictures, audio and videos all away from kids. There are many other unique features which you will get to know when you use it.

Overall, I can say that, it is the best device I have ever bought. To all smartphone buyers highly recommended, it is highly recommended to buy this super cool tab and it is like mini laptop. I have a great experience with this amazing phone and it is absolutely worth investing money on this smart tab.

I recently bought this Samsung tab and I must say it is great at the price that it comes in.
It has a slim and sleek design and superior specifications, this tab feels great in hand
and easy to carry as it’s very lightweight, Easy to use with one hand too. Some of the
best features and specifications that I really liked about this product are listed below :
1. I am in love with its UI, super smooth and good icons. This 'Samsung One UI' is
fast and smooth.
2. An 8 inches screen with vibrant display and good color quality in this tablet.
3. The dual speakers are another plus point for a clear and loud sound.
4. The powerful battery (5100 mAh) lasts long enough so you can watch movies or
play games without any interruption.
5. Enough Internal Storage (32GB) + we can add SD card too and can install more
games.
6. Camera quality is mind-blowing, great pictures and shots
7. Latest Android Pie (9.0) version to unlock more features and functionalities
I personally use this tablet to read books and share it with my brother (it has Kids
Mode too). Overall, it's an amazing affordable tablet, and can be used for various
purposes. I am very happy with this purchase.

This Tab A 8.0 from Samsung is just so nice. Talking about the highlights-
Display: It has an 8'' display which is really bright & clear.
Weight: It is so light in weight and so easy to carry anywhere and everywhere!
Battery: It has a 5100 mAh lithium battery. Even the battery life is much more than anything that other tabs offer.
RAM: It has 2GB RAM and 32 GB ROM which is really compatible with medium level graphic games such as PUBG.
It has a primary camera of 8MP which is really good for a tablet. It helps with clarity pictures as well as video calls.
There is a Dual Speaker system which gives enhanced sound clarity and works really well for videos and movies.
The Kids Mode feature of this tab helps me keep my apps and data safe from my four year old nephew!
It Works only on WiFi which makes it easier to do a video call, play games etc!!

I’m happy I made a smart decision to buy this tab!

I thought of giving this tab to my little brother as he loves watching movies and cartoons all the time. This tab has great speakers and we do not have to plug-in earphones for that.
It is a budget tablet and boasts a price as modest as its specs.
The Samsung Tab A8. 0' s design is on-trend. It's slim , lightweight. Its smooth back panel is comfortable against your finger tips, and its rounded edges make it easy to grip. It is slim and lightweight! The skin is user-friendly, easy to navigate. It also features a multi-window function. For a basic tablet, it smoothly handles running two apps at once. The standard pair of cameras on the Galaxy Tab A8. 0 is decent for a tablet. Both the rear 8 megapixels and front-facing 5 megapixels camera produce clear, in-focus photos, but sharpness at full resolution looks soft around the edges.
I love using this Samsung Galaxy Tab A8.
Few other pros of this tab are:
Display quality,
Build quality,
One UI software,
Battery backup,
Gaming experience,
Good camera,
Dual speakers etc.
According to me, whoever wants to have a tablet for their professional purposes, games and entertainment, you must definitely go for this one!

Writing this review after 3 months of usage
Pros :- 1) battery backup is good enough , lasts easily almost a day or more .
2) Samsung's one UI is simple and easy to use.
3)build quality is also sturdy and solid.
4) sound output at high volume is very good.

Cons:- 1) performance is not good. It's understandable because it's processor is for entry level users only.
IT'S NOT FOR GAMING .
and you'll notice lags and stutters quite often.
2) camera is below average.
It can just take pictures of low resolution .
3) charging from 0-100 will take more than 2 hours easily.
4) display is HD+ only. And the screen size is big.
So the image quality doesn't look sharp.
colours are ok . And viewing angles are good from side.
Note : there are two variants of this device , 1) wifi only 2)wifi + 4G
I used the wifi only version.


conclusion : this TAB is recommended mainly for light users and for media consumption like watching moveis.
I use this for study purpose like watching lectures.
IT'S NOT FOR GAMING AT ALL.
AND it'll lag often if you do some heavy task on it.

But according to the price and coming from a brand like Samsung . It's overall a decent deal.

Wow!!! This is definitely one of the best budget tablets. Value for money product 👍 You will never be disappointed with the purchase. Im in lobeee (love) with my tab 😍😍😍 even since I got that.♥️

*Pretty good to watch videos. Ofc YouTube allows you to watch 720p. Use some other to watch fhd videos.
*Battery gives me 11+ hours of screen-on-time.
*Initially had issues with the wifi as I use my phone's hotspot. The problem was solved once I set "AP band" option to 5.0 hz under hotspot advanced settings. Try that, it may help.
*Hearing music thru my earphones along with Dolby Atmos,,,, wow 😍😍😍. It has a different feel that u should try.
*No issues with the touch as well. Smooth enough 👍
*No lags so far. I didn't install many apps, as I use my tab for learning purposes. Never tried gaming.

Overall the best in this segment i would say. Thanks! :)

This is the best tab in this price segment and can be used only for reading and for watching movies.

pros.5100 mAh Battery: The 5100 mAh battery of this tablet is massive enough to power it for 2 days on normal use.
pros.Weight: This tablet is lightweight and very easy to carry around anywhere and everywhere.
pros.Display: This tablet features a 20.32-cm (8) screen that has a 1280 x 800 pixels resolution which gives it the optimal viewing experience.
pros.Sound: The dual speakers of this tablet give an enhanced sound quality and stunning clarity which is amazing.
pros.Camera: The 8MP primary camera of this tablet is good enough at this price range and clicks decent photos.

cons.Charger: The charger is not powerful enough and takes a long time to get the tablet fully charged.

summary.verdict: Overall the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A is a perfect purchase at an affordable price with premium specs.
summary.Additional Information: Keyboard attachable, Useful for online teaching, Contains headphone jack.
